For example- Jharkhand- Panchayati Raj Institution Act further each village will be represented by one or more ward members who will represent at Gram Panchayat level. - Chairman of Gram Panchayat is popularly known as Mukhiya or Pradhan in most of the states. - And the chairman may be elected directly by the people. Gram Panchayat or indirectly elected among the ward members. This depends upon the state legislature. - For ex- Jharkhand and Bihar which few states and still have the post of Sarpanch.
